Package org.biopax.validator.api

Interface Rule<T>

Type Parameters:
T - a type of a model object or a data parser, stream, etc.
All Known Subinterfaces:
CvRule<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCardinalityAndRangeRule, AbstractCvRule, AbstractRule, BaseRule, CardinalityAndRangeRule, CvTermsRule
public interface Rule<T>
A validation rule.
Author:
rodche

  • Method Details

    • check

      void check(org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation validation, T thing)
      Validates the object.
      Parameters:
      validation - the object where the model, validation settings and errors are stored
      thing - to validate

    • canCheck

      boolean canCheck(Object thing)
      Can check it?
      Parameters:
      thing - an object to validate
      Returns:
      True when this rule can check the object.

    • error

      void error(org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation validation, Object object, String code, boolean setFixed, Object... args)
      Saves the error or warning that occurred or was fixed. Call this method from a validation rule implementation every time after a problem is found and/or fixed.
      Parameters:
      validation - the object where the model, validation settings and errors are stored
      object - that is invalid or caused the error
      code - error code, e.g., 'illegal.value'
      setFixed - true/false - whether the issue was auto-fixed or not
      args - extra parameters for the error message template
